parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscription})
| project id

parameters.name: KeyVault
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscription})
| project id=tolower(id)

links.linkLabel: Azure Defender for Key Vault alerts

content.query:
union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "AzureDiagnostics" and Category == "AuditEvent" and ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| summarize count() by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize logsKVs = make_set(ResourceId)
| extend selectedKVs = "[{KeyVault}]"
| extend selectedKVs = replace("'", '"', selectedKVs)
| extend selectedKVs = todynamic(selectedKVs)
| mv-expand KVId = selectedKVs
| project KVId = toupper(tostring(KVId)), ["Diagnostic logs"] = (logsKVs has tostring(KVId))
| extend ["Diagnostic settings"] = iff(["Diagnostic logs"] == false, strcat("https://ms.portal.azure.com/#@microsoft.onmicrosoft.com/resource", KVId, "/diagnostics"), "")
| order by ["Diagnostic settings"] desc

union withsource=_TableName *
| where _TableName == "AzureDiagnostics" and Category == "AuditEvent" and ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| summarize count() by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize logsKVs = make_set(ResourceId)
| extend selectedKVs = "[{KeyVault}]"
| extend selectedKVs = replace("'", '"', selectedKVs)
| extend selectedKVs = todynamic(selectedKVs)
| mv-expand KVId = selectedKVs
| project KVId = toupper(tostring(KVId)),isDiag = (logsKVs has tostring(KVId))
| summarize KeyVaults = count() by isDiag
| project KeyVaults, ['Diagnostic logs for Key Vaults'] = iif(isDiag,'Diagnostic logs collected','Diagnostic logs not collected')

content.json: ## Key vault activity baselines and deviations

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > {BaselineTimeRange:start}
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| summarize DailyCount = count() by ResourceId, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| make-series metric = sum(DailyCount) on TimeGenerated in range({BaselineTimeRange:start}, now()-1d, 1d) by ResourceId
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(metric) // Anomaly detection
| project ResourceId, day = (TimeGenerated), DailyCounts = metric, AnomalyScore = series_decompose_anomalies_metric_ad_score
| extend MaxAnomalyScore = AnomalyScore, MinAnomalyScore = AnomalyScore, AnomlyScoreTrend = AnomalyScore
| mv-apply MaxAnomalyScore to typeof(real) on (top 1 by MaxAnomalyScore desc)
| mv-apply MinAnomalyScore to typeof(real) on (top 1 by MinAnomalyScore asc)
| mv-expand with_itemindex=Index AnomalyScore
| where Index == array_length(DailyCounts)-1
| project-away day, Index
| extend AnomalyScoreAbs = abs(toreal(AnomalyScore))
| extend WasAnomalous = iif(MaxAnomalyScore > 3 or MinAnomalyScore < -3, true, false)
| extend Anomalous = iif(AnomalyScoreAbs > 3, true, false)
| order by AnomalyScoreAbs desc
content.title: Daily anomaly scores, by key vault

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > {BaselineTimeRange:start}
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower('{SelectedResource}')
| summarize DailyCount = count() by ResourceId, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| make-series metric = sum(DailyCount) on TimeGenerated in range({BaselineTimeRange:start}, now()-1d, 1d) by ResourceId
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(metric) // Anomaly detection
| project ResourceId, day = (TimeGenerated), DailyCounts = metric, AnomalyScore = series_decompose_anomalies_metric_ad_score
content.title: Daily activity over time for the selected key vault (from the list above)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > {BaselineTimeRange:start}
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower('{SelectedResource}')
| summarize DailyCount = count() by ResourceId, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| make-series metric = sum(DailyCount) on TimeGenerated in range({BaselineTimeRange:start}, now()-1d, 1d) by ResourceId
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(metric) // Anomaly detection
| project ResourceId, day = (TimeGenerated), DailyCounts = metric, AnomalyScore = series_decompose_anomalies_metric_ad_score
content.title: Anomaly score over time for the selected key vault (from the list above)

content.json: ## Azure Defender for Key Vaults coverage

content.query:
datatable (Event:string)
    ["AKV Workbook"]
| extend keyvault = (strcat("[", "{KeyVault}", "]"))
| extend keyvault = todynamic(replace("'", '"', keyvault))
| mvexpand keyvault
| extend subscriptionId = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tostring(keyvault))
| summarize AKVs = count() by subscriptionId, DefenderForKV = 0
| union
(
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
| where name == "KeyVaults"
| project DefenderForKV = iif(properties.pricingTier == 'Standard', 1, 0), AKVs = 0, subscriptionId
)
| summarize AKVs = sum(AKVs), DefenderForKV = sum(DefenderForKV) by subscriptionId
| project Subscription = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId), ["Kay Vaults"] = AKVs, ['Defender for Key Vault'] = iif(DefenderForKV > 0,'yes','no'), ['Onboard Azure Defender'] = iif(DefenderForKV > 0, '', 'https://ms.portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/26')
| order by ['Defender for Key Vault'] asc
content.title: Subscriptions covered by Azure Defender for Key Vault

content.query:
datatable (Event:string)
    ["AKV Workbook"]
| extend keyvaults = (strcat("[", "{KeyVault}", "]"))
| extend keyvaults = todynamic(replace("'", '"', keyvaults))
| mvexpand keyvaults
| extend subscriptionId = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tostring(keyvaults))
| summarize AKVs = count() by subscriptionId, DefenderForKV = 0
| union
(
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
| where name == "KeyVaults"
| project DefenderForKV = iif(properties.pricingTier == 'Standard', 1, 0), AKVs = 0, subscriptionId
)
| summarize AKVs = sum(AKVs), DefenderForKV = sum(DefenderForKV) by subscriptionId
| project Subscription = 1, ['Defender for Key Vault'] = iif(DefenderForKV > 0,'Protected by Azure Defender','Not protected by Azure Defender')

content.json: ## Azure Defender for Key Vaults alerts

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc

SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| where AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ResourceId
| project Resource = tolower(ResourceId), AlertCount
| order by AlertCount desc

SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{AlertSeverity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{AlertSeverity}")
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where ResourceId in ({KeyVault})
| make-series Count=count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ResourceId
//| summarize Count=count() by ResourceId, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Key vault alerts
content.noDataMessage: No alrets from Azure Defender for Key Vaults

content.query:
let Incidents = SecurityIncident
| project AlertIds, IncidentUrl
|mv-expand AlertId = AlertIds
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertId);
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRange:start} .. ({TimeRange:end} + {TimeRange:grain}))
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where ResourceId in ({KeyVault})
| where AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, AlertSeverity, DisplayName, AlertLink, AlertId=tostring(SystemAlertId)
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| join kind=leftouter Incidents on AlertId
| project-away AlertIds, AlertId1
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, AlertSeverity, DisplayName, ['Azure Defender Alert'] = AlertLink, Incident = IncidentUrl, AlertId
content.title: Key vault alerts

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where SystemAlertId == '{SelectedAlertId}';
let nodes = data
| project Id = SystemAlertId, Name = DisplayName, Size = 1, Kind = 'alert'
| union (
data 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities)
| project Id = strcat(SystemAlertId, '-',$id), Name = strcat(ResourceId,Address,AadUserId), Size = 1, Kind = Type
);
let links = data
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities)
| project SourceId = SystemAlertId, TargetId = strcat(SystemAlertId, '-', $id), Size = 1, Kind = Type;
nodes | union (links)
content.title: Alert and entity graph (chose an alert from the list above)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| summarize Count = count() by Resource, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by key vault

| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| summarize EventCount=count() by Resource
| order by EventCount desc
content.title: Activity, by key vault

content.title: Events, by key vault distribution

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| summarize Count = count() by CallerIPAddress, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by Caller IP

content.query:
let AlertIPs = SecurityAlert
| project parse_json(Entities), AlertLink, SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| extend parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand Entities
| where Entities has 'Address'
| project IP = tostring(split(split(Entities, 'Address":"')[1], '"')[0]), AlertLink, AlertId = tostring(SystemAlertId);
let Incidents = SecurityIncident
| project AlertIds, Title, Severity, IncidentUrl
|mv-expand AlertId = AlertIds
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertId);
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| summarize EventCount=count() by IP = tostring(CallerIPAddress)
| join kind=leftouter AlertIPs on IP
| project-away IP1
| order by EventCount desc
| join kind=leftouter Incidents on AlertId
| project-away AlertIds, AlertId1
| extend Incident = IncidentUrl
| summarize ['Related incidents'] = count(Incident != '') by IP, EventCount
| order by ['Related incidents'], EventCount desc
content.title: Activity by Caller IP

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| summarize EventCount=count() by CallerIPAddress
content.title: Events, by Caller IP distribution

content.query:
let AlertIPs = SecurityAlert
| extend parse_json(Entities), AlertLink, SystemAlertId, AlertType
| mv-expand Entities
| extend parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand Entities
| where Entities has 'Address'
| project IP = tostring(split(split(Entities, 'Address":"')[1], '"')[0]), TimeGenerated, DisplayName, Description, ProductName, AlertLink, AlertSeverity, AlertId = tostring(SystemAlertId);
let Incidents = SecurityIncident
| project AlertIds, Title, Severity, IncidentUrl
|mv-expand AlertId = AlertIds
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertId);
AlertIPs
| where IP in ('{SelectedIP}')
| join kind=leftouter Incidents on AlertId
| project-away AlertIds, AlertId1
| project TimeGenerated, Title, ProductName, Severity, Incident = IncidentUrl
| where isempty(Incident) == false
content.title: Incidents involving the selected Caller IP (selected above)

items.name: Incidents involving the selected Caller IP

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| extend User = identity_claim_http_schemas_xmlsoap_org_ws_2005_05_identity_claims_upn_s
| extend ObjectId = identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g
| extend ApplicationId = identity_claim_appid_g
| summarize Count = count() by Identity = iff(isempty(User), ObjectId, User) , bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by Identity

content.query:
let AlertIDs = SecurityAlert
| project parse_json(Entities), AlertLink, SystemAlertId, TimeGenerated
| mv-expand Entities
| extend parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand Entities
| where Entities has 'AadUserId'
| project ID = tostring(split(split(Entities, 'AadUserId":"')[1], '"')[0]), TimeGenerated, AlertLink, AlertId = SystemAlertId;
let Incidents = SecurityIncident
| project AlertIds, IncidentUrl
|mv-expand AlertId = AlertIds
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertId);
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| extend User = identity_claim_http_schemas_xmlsoap_org_ws_2005_05_identity_claims_upn_s
| extend ObjectId = identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g
| extend ApplicationId = identity_claim_appid_g
| where isempty(ObjectId) == false or isempty(User) == false or isempty(ApplicationId) == false
| extend ID = iif(isempty(ObjectId), ApplicationId, ObjectId)
//| summarize EventCount=count() by Identity = iif(isempty(User),iif(isempty(ObjectId), ApplicationId, ObjectId), User), Identifier = iif(isempty(User),iif(isempty(ObjectId), 'AppId', 'ObjectId'), 'User'), ID
| summarize EventCount=count() by Identity = iif(isempty(ObjectId), ApplicationId, ObjectId), Identifier = iif(isempty(User),iif(isempty(ObjectId), 'AppId', 'ObjectId'), 'User'), User, ID
| join kind=leftouter AlertIDs on ID
| project-away ID, ID1
| order by EventCount desc
| join kind=leftouter Incidents on AlertId
| project-away AlertIds, AlertId1
| extend Incident = IncidentUrl
| summarize ['Related incidents'] = count(Incident != '') by Identity, Identifier, User, EventCount
| order by ['Related incidents'], EventCount desc
content.title: Activity, by Identity

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})

| extend ApplicationId = identity_claim_appid_g
| summarize EventCount=count() by Identiy = iif(isempty(User), ObjectId, User)
content.title: Events, by Identity distribution

AlertIDs

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics

| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| where HttpStatusCode = tostring(httpStatusCode_d) !startswith "20"
| summarize Count = count() by OperationName, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by operation name

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| where HttpStatusCode = tostring(httpStatusCode_d) !startswith "20"
| summarize EventCount=count() by OperationName
content.title: Activity, by operation name

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| where HttpStatusCode = tostring(httpStatusCode_d) !startswith "20"
| summarize EventCount=count() by OperationName
| order by EventCount desc
content.title: Events, by operation name distribution

content.query:
let SensitiveOperationList = dynamic(["VaultDelete", "KeyDelete", "SecretDelete", "SecretPurge", "KeyPurge", "SecretBackup", "KeyBackup"]);
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| extend Result = columnifexists("ResultType", "NoResult")
| extend requestUri_s = columnifexists("requestUri_s", "None"), identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g = columnifexists("identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g", "None")
| extend id_s = columnifexists("id_s", "None"), CallerIPAddress = columnifexists("CallerIPAddress", "None"), clientInfo_s = columnifexists("clientInfo_s", "None")
| where Result !~ "None" and isnotempty(Result)
| where identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g !~ "None" and isnotempty(identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g)
| where id_s !~ "None" and isnotempty(id_s)
| where CallerIPAddress !~ "None" and isnotempty(CallerIPAddress)
| where clientInfo_s !~ "None" and isnotempty(clientInfo_s)
| where requestUri_s !~ "None" and isnotempty(requestUri_s)
| where ResourceType =~ "VAULTS" and Result =~ "Success" 
| where OperationName in~ (SensitiveOperationList)  
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, Result, OperationName, CallerIPAddress, identity_claim_appid_g, identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g, identity_claim_http_schemas_xmlsoap_org_ws_2005_05_identity_claims_upn_s, identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_scope_s, requestUri_s, clientInfo_s
content.title: Sensitive Operations

content.query:
let EventCountThreshold = {EventCountThreshold};
let MonitoredTimeRange = {MonitoredTimeRange:start};
let OperationList = dynamic(
["SecretGet", "KeyGet", "VaultGet"]);
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > MonitoredTimeRange
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| extend Result = columnifexists("ResultType", "None"), identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g = columnifexists("identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g", "None")
| where Result !~ "None" and isnotempty(Result)
| where identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g !~ "None" and isnotempty(identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g)
| where ResourceType =~ "VAULTS" and Result =~ "Success"
| where OperationName in (OperationList) 
| summarize EventCount = count(), OperationNames = make_set(OperationName), CallerIPList = make_set(CallerIPAddress), RequestUriList = make_set(requestUri_s), ClientInfoList = make_set(clientInfo_s) by ResourceId, Result, identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g, identity_claim_appid_g, identity_claim_http_schemas_xmlsoap_org_ws_2005_05_identity_claims_upn_s
| where EventCount > EventCountThreshold
| order by EventCount desc
content.title: Mass Secret Retrieval

parameters.name: KeyVaultOperationAnalysis
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscription})
| project id=tolower(id)
| where id in ({KeyVault})

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where Category == "AuditEvent"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVaultOperationAnalysis})
| where OperationName contains tostring('{selectedTab}')
| extend User = identity_claim_http_schemas_xmlsoap_org_ws_2005_05_identity_claims_upn_s
| extend ObjectId = identity_claim_http_schemas_microsoft_com_identity_claims_objectidentifier_g
| extend userActivity = iif(isempty(User),0,1), serviceActivity = iif(isempty(User),1,0)
| summarize UserCount=sum(userActivity), ServiceCount=sum(serviceActivity), AllCount = count() by OperationName, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain}/10)
| extend Count = iif(tostring('{Identity}') == 'all', AllCount, iif(tostring('{Identity}') == 'users', UserCount, ServiceCount))
| extend Count = iif(tostring('{GetOperationsScale}') == 'log', iif(OperationName contains "get", log(Count), toreal(Count)), toreal(Count))
